activities: Borderfree, Inc. facilitates international ecommerce through its Borderfree product, allowing international customers to purchase products from U.S. retailers at an all inclusive price in the buyer’s currency.  The information collected by Borderfree during the Borderfree Global Checkout is consistent with information typically collected by transactional ecommerce web sites as that information is necessary to accept and process purchase instructions for merchandise.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
